entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
